description: This file defines a Flutter screen widget 'MenuScreen' which displays a list of menu items with category filtering, item cards, and navigation to item details. It includes UI components, state management, and interactions with cart and menu providers.

classes.name: MenuScreen
classes.description: Stateful widget that displays the menu with categories and item cards.

classes.name: _Header
classes.description: Stateless widget for the categories filter header with ChoiceChips.

classes.name: _MenuCard
classes.description: Stateful widget for individual menu item cards, handling add to cart and navigation.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the UI for 'MenuScreen', including category filtering and grid of menu items.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the UI for '_Header', displaying category choice chips.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the UI for '_MenuCard', displaying item details, image, and add button.
